page.title: 16Paulton Schools.
page.content: { Paulton Infant School,}built in 1974, has 198 pupils, aged from 4 to 7, in 6 classes.{Paulton Junior School,}built 1972,has 234 pupils,aged from 7 to 11, in 8 classes.The two schools share a large site.Both are built in a semi_ open plan design,with classrooms around a central courtyard. The two schools have a joint PTA. A variety of fund_raising events take place during the school year.The May Fayre and the Christmas Bazaar are the two main attractions. The Junior School has many has clubs after school for gym,football,netball, drama,choir,country dancingand rugby. { Paulton swimming pool}is next door to the two schools.Built by the PTA in 1974,it is now run by a Management Committee.School children have regular swimming lessons and there is a thriving swimming club.
